verses.verse: And there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, besides <S%H905><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> that was in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>. And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> unto Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, unto Gerar <S%H1642><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and said, Go not down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which I shall tell thee of <S%H559><s%>:

sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>, and I will be with thee <S%H1288><s%>, and will bless thee <S%H2233><s%>; for unto thee, and unto thy seed, I will give <S%H5414><s%> all these <S%H411><s%> lands <S%H776><s%>, and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>;

and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> all these <S%H411><s%> lands <S%H2233><s%>; and in thy seed shall all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%>;

because <S%H6118><s%> that Abraham <S%H85><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and kept <S%H8104><s%> my charge <S%H4931><s%>, my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and my laws <S%H8451><s%>.
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Gerar <S%H1642><s%>:

and the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him of his wife <S%H802><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, She is my sister <S%H269><s%>: for he feared <S%H3372><s%> to say <S%H559><s%>, My wife <S%H802><s%>; lest <S%H582><s%>, said he, the men of the place <S%H4725><s%> should kill <S%H2026><s%> me for Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>; because she was fair <S%H2896><s%> to look upon <S%H4758><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H748><s%>, when he had been there a long time <S%H3117><s%>, that Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> looked out <S%H8259><s%> at <S%H1157><s%> a window <S%H2474><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H3327><s%>, behold, Isaac was sporting <S%H6711><s%> with Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H389><s%>, of a surety she is thy wife <S%H802><s%>: and how saidst <S%H559><s%> thou <S%H269><s%>, She is my sister? And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Because I said, Lest I die because of her <S%H4191><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, What is this thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> unto us <S%H259><s%>? One of the people <S%H5971><s%> might easily <S%H4592><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> with thy wife <S%H802><s%>, and thou wouldest have brought <S%H935><s%> guiltiness upon us <S%H817><s%>.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, He that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> this man <S%H376><s%> or his wife <S%H802><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sowed <S%H2232><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> in the same year <S%H8141><s%> a hundredfold <S%H3967><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> blessed him <S%H1288><s%>.
And the man <S%H376><s%> waxed great <S%H1431><s%>, and grew <S%H1432><s%> more <S%H3212><s%> and more <S%H1980><s%> until he became <S%H1431><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1431><s%>:

and he had possessions <S%H4735><s%> of flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and possessions <S%H4735><s%> of herds <S%H1241><s%>, and a great <S%H7227><s%> household <S%H5657><s%>: and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> envied him <S%H7065><s%>.

Now all the wells <S%H875><s%> which his father <S%H1><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%> had digged <S%H2658><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had stopped <S%H5640><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> with earth <S%H6083><s%>.
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> from us <S%H3966><s%>; for thou art much mightier than we <S%H6105><s%>.
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> thence <S%H2583><s%>, and encamped in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> digged <S%H2658><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the wells <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, which they had digged <S%H2658><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>; for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had stopped <S%H5640><s%> them after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>; and he called <S%H7121><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> after the names <S%H8034><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had called them <S%H7121><s%>.
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%> digged <S%H2658><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> there a well <S%H875><s%> of springing <S%H2416><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>.

And the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Isaac <S%H3327><s%>'s herdsmen <S%H7462><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The water <S%H4325><s%> is ours <S%H7121><s%>: and he called the name <S%H8034><s%> of the well <S%H875><s%> Esek <S%H6230><s%>, because they contended with him <S%H6229><s%>.
And they digged <S%H2658><s%> another <S%H312><s%> well <S%H875><s%>, and they strove <S%H7378><s%> for that also <S%H7121><s%>: and he called the name of it <S%H8034><s%> Sitnah <S%H7856><s%>.

And he removed <S%H6275><s%> from thence <S%H2658><s%>, and digged another <S%H312><s%> well <S%H875><s%>; and for that they strove <S%H7378><s%> not <S%H7121><s%>: and he called the name of it <S%H8034><s%> Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, For now <S%H6258><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made room <S%H7337><s%> for us <S%H6509><s%>, and we shall be fruitful in the land <S%H776><s%>.
And he went up <S%H5927><s%> from thence to Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto him the same night <S%H3915><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I am the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H854><s%>, for I am with thee <S%H1288><s%>, and will bless thee <S%H7235><s%>, and multiply thy seed <S%H2233><s%> for my servant <S%H5650><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s sake.

And he builded <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H7121><s%>, and called upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> there <S%H3327><s%>: and there Isaac's servants <S%H5650><s%> digged <S%H3738><s%> a well <S%H875><s%>.

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to him from Gerar <S%H1642><s%>, and Ahuzzath <S%H276><s%> his friend <S%H4828><s%>, and Phicol <S%H6369><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%> of his host <S%H6635><s%>.
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4069><s%>, Wherefore are ye come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H8130><s%>, seeing ye hate me <S%H7971><s%>, and have sent me away from you?

And they said <S%H559><s%>, We saw <S%H7200><s%> plainly <S%H7200><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with thee <S%H559><s%>: and we said, Let there now be an oath <S%H423><s%> betwixt <S%H996><s%> us <S%H996><s%>, even betwixt us and thee <S%H3772><s%>, and let us make a covenant with thee <S%H1285><s%>,

that thou wilt do <S%H6213><s%> us no hurt <S%H7451><s%>, as we have not touched <S%H5060><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>, and as we have done unto thee nothing but <S%H7535><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>, and have sent thee away <S%H7971><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>: thou art now <S%H6258><s%> the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast <S%H4960><s%>, and they did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%>.

And they rose up betimes <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>: and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sent them away <S%H7971><s%>, and they departed <S%H3212><s%> from him in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And it came to pass the same day <S%H3117><s%>, that Isaac <S%H3327><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> him concerning <S%H182><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> which they had digged <S%H2658><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H4672><s%>, We have found water <S%H4325><s%>.
And he called <S%H7121><s%> it Shibah <S%H7656><s%>: therefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> is Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And when Esau <S%H6215><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> Judith <S%H3067><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Beeri <S%H882><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and Basemath <S%H1315><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Elon <S%H356><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>:
and they were a grief <S%H4786><s%> of mind <S%H7307><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>.
